description: Returns information about the label group.

parameters.name: LabelGroupName
parameters.description: Returns the name of the label group.

nested_items.name: LabelGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the label group.

nested_items.name: LabelGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the label group.

nested_items.name: FaultCodes
nested_items.description: Codes indicating the type of anomaly associated with the labels in the lagbel group.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the label group was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the label group was updated.
